statements: DELETE FROM public_transport_usage WHERE user_id = 101 AND route_id = 201;
DELETE FROM public_transport_usage WHERE user_id = 101 AND route_id = 201;
DELETE FROM public_transport_usage WHERE fare > 50 AND date < '2022-01-01' AND distance_traveled < 10.5;
DELETE FROM public_transportation_system WHERE city_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM transportation_logs WHERE user_id = 101 AND distance_traveled > 100;
DELETE FROM Transportation_Analytics WHERE carbon_emission > 100 AND analysis_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM fare WHERE route_id = 201 AND fare_amount > 50.00;
